get.description:
Required permission : NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:CHAT [READ] with scope social
load personal chat history in a namespace.

parameters.description: user ID that receive the chat
parameters.name: friendId

post.description:
Required permission : NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:FRIENDS [CREATE] with scope social
friends request in a namespace.

get.description:
Required permission : NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:CHAT [READ] with scope social
get chat history in a namespace.

parameters.description: user ID that receive the chat
parameters.name: friendId

get.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:*:LOBBY:CONFIG [READ] with scope social
get lobby config of all namespaces.

Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:LOBBY:CONFIG [READ] with scope social
get lobby config of a namespace.

put.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:LOBBY:CONFIG [UPDATE] with scope social
update lobby config of a namespace.

get.description:
Required permission : NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:FRIENDS [READ] with scope social
get list of friends in a namespace.

parameters.description: numbers of row to skip within the result
parameters.name: offset

post.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:NOTIFICATION [CREATE] with scope social
Sends notification to multiple user. There are two types of notification: sync and async. Async message will be stored to database if the receiver is offline. This stored message could be retrieved later via websocket command.
Action Code: 50211
post.summary: send freeform notification to multiple users

post.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:NOTIFICATION [CREATE] with scope social
Sends notification to all connected users in a namespace.
Action Code: 50201
post.summary: send freeform notification to connected users

get.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:NOTIFICATION [READ] with scope social
Get all templates in a namespace
Action Code: 50203
get.summary: get all notification template in a namespace

post.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:NOTIFICATION [CREATE] with scope social
Create new notification template. Include handlebars {{key}} for replaceable contexts. The the key inside handlebars will be the key to be replaced when sending notification. Already existing template with the same slug and language can not be created.
Check model description for detailed input restrictions.
Action Code: 50204

Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:NOTIFICATION [CREATE] with scope social
Sends notification to all connected users in a namespace with predefined template.
In the request body, specify which template slug (template identifier) to use and the template language.
NotificationTemplate context is the key-value pair defining the value of each handlebar specified in the template content. Template need to be published before it can be use to send notifications
Action Code: 50202
post.summary: send notification to a user with template

get.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:NOTIFICATION [READ] with scope social
Get all templates in a namespace
Action Code: 50205
get.summary: get all notification template localization in a slug

parameters.description: first language code of next page
parameters.name: before

parameters.description: last language code of previous page
parameters.name: after

delete.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:NOTIFICATION [DELETE] with scope social
Delete template slug in notification template
Action Code: 50206
delete.summary: delete template slug in notification template

get.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:NOTIFICATION [READ] with scope social
Get a template localization
Action Code: 50207

parameters.description: Template Identifier, only alphabet characters and hyphens are permitted
parameters.name: templateSlug

parameters.description: template language, follows IETF BCP 47 standard
parameters.name: templateLanguage

put.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:NOTIFICATION [UPDATE] with scope social
update template localization
Action Code: 50208

parameters.description: Template Identifier, only alphabet characters and hyphens are permitted
parameters.name: templateSlug

parameters.description: template language, follows IETF BCP 47 standard
parameters.name: templateLanguage

delete.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:NOTIFICATION [DELETE] with scope social
delete template localization
Action Code: 50209

parameters.description: Template Identifier, only alphabet characters and hyphens are permitted
parameters.name: templateSlug

parameters.description: template language, follows IETF BCP 47 standard
parameters.name: templateLanguage

post.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:NOTIFICATION [CREATE] with scope social
Publish notification template draft. Empty draft can not be published.
Action Code: 50210

parameters.description: Template Identifier, only alphabet characters and hyphens are permitted
parameters.name: templateSlug

parameters.description: template language, follows IETF BCP 47 standard
parameters.name: templateLanguage

get.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:NOTIFICATION [READ] with scope social
get topic by namespace.
Action Code: 50213

parameters.description: first topic name of next page
parameters.name: before

parameters.description: last topic name of previous page
parameters.name: after

post.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:NOTIFICATION [CREATE] with scope social
Create new notification topic.
topic should be alphabets, no special char except underscore, uppercase and no spacing. for example: TOPIC_TEST. Already existing topic can not be created
Action Code: 50214

get.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:NOTIFICATION [READ] with scope social
get topic information by topic name.
Action Code: 50215
get.summary: get topic information by topic name

put.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:NOTIFICATION [UPDATE] with scope social
update topic information by topic name.
topic should be alphabets, no special char except underscore, uppercase and no spacing. for example: TOPIC_TEST. Already existing topic can not be created
Action Code: 50216
put.summary: update topic information by topic name

delete.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:NOTIFICATION [DELETE] with scope social
delete topic information by topic name.
topic should be alphabets, no special char except underscore, uppercase and no spacing. for example: TOPIC_TEST. Already existing topic can not be created
Action Code: 50217
delete.summary: delete topic information by topic name

post.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:NOTIFICATION [CREATE] with scope social
Sends notification to a user. There are two types of notification: sync and async. Async message will be stored to database if the receiver is offline. This stored message could be retrieved later via websocket command.
Action Code: 50211
post.summary: send freeform notification to a user

post.description:
Required permission : ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:NOTIFICATION [CREATE] with scope social
Sends templated notification to a user. There are two types of notification: sync and async. Async message will be stored to database if the receiver is offline. This stored message could be retrieved later via websocket command.
In the request body, specify which template slug (template identifier) to use and the template language.
NotificationTemplate context is the key-value pair defining the value of each handlebar specified in the template content. Template need to be published before it can be use to send notifications
Action Code: 50212
post.summary: send templated notification to specific user
